comment: YOU GUYS !!! She's so damn cute. first time I see the baby. and the bed looks dope. so so good. glad the video popped up on my suggested, looking forward to seeing the remodel journey a second time around <3 besos from buenos aires. - Pame
Hi there! I'm new on this channel
Now I wonder if I make a poop face while I'm drilling? ü§î

I really enjoy a handheld electric rivet gun. Expensive but sooo much easier! The manual one KILLED my hands...as a hand therapist, investing on the health of your hands is so important!! :) Beautiful airstream by the way!!

To explain my first dislike on one of your videos: I'm worried. You wouldn't be allowed to make such changes on your own where I come from. There are strict guidelines/ laws to follow to ensure your own, your childs' and other road users' safety. Please consider consulting at least a structural engineer, an architect or someone similar.. My best wishes to you.

@Kristen & Siya Well, I live in Germany, the land of guidelines, rules and bureaucracy ;) It's not just about building a bed/ doing a renovation but also changing the whole static of the trailer. The changes have to be approved also to get/ keep it insured here. I realise that other countries handle things differently - which doesn't mean it's safe. I really don't want to trash talk other countries' rules. I'm just worried for you. Thank you for responding (and maybe considering to get it checked).
There are strict guidelines for building a bed or doing any type of renovation? I've never heard of such a thing. Do you realize how many people do this? Where are you from?
